t=int(raw_input())
while t :
    s=raw_input()
    n=int(s)
    arr=[]
    n1=n
    count = 0
    while n1 :
        a=raw_input()
        arr.append(a)
        ch=0
        for ele in reversed(arr[:-1]) :
            if ele[:-2] == a[:-2] :
                ch=1
                if ele[-1] == '+' :
                    count = count - 1
                else :
                    count = count + 1
                if a[-1] == '+' :
                    count = count + 1
                else :
                    count = count - 1
                break
                
        if ch==0 :
            ele=arr[-1]
            if ele[-1]=='+' :
                count = count + 1
            else :
                count = count - 1
        
        n1 = n1-1
    print count
    t=t-1
